name: excel-formula-beautifier
title: Excel Formula Beautifier
description: Allows excel formula in clipboard to be beautified.
author: oliverde8

commands.name: excel-beautifier-clipboard
commands.title: Excel Beautifier from Clipboard
commands.description: Beautify Excel formula from clipboard content.

commands.name: excel-beautifier-form
commands.title: Excel Beautifier with Form Input
commands.description: Enter and beautify Excel formulas using a text input form.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
